name: mris_curvature_stats
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Tool for calculating statistics on surface curvature values.

inputs.description: Subject name defined in the SUBJECTS_DIR
inputs.name: Subject Name

inputs.description: Hemisphere, can be 'lh' or 'rh'
inputs.name: Hemisphere

inputs.description: Optional list of curvature files to process
inputs.name: Curvature Files

inputs.description: Average the curvature number of times.
inputs.name: Number of Averages

inputs.description: Calculate principal curvatures and derived maps.
inputs.name: Principal Curvatures Flag

inputs.description: Use discrete calculation method for principal curvatures.
inputs.name: Discrete Method Flag

inputs.description: Use continuous calculation method for principal curvatures.
inputs.name: Continuous Method Flag

inputs.description: Assign signed max and min to principal curvature K1 and K2.
inputs.name: Signed Principals Flag

inputs.description: Multiply curvature value by the area of its vertex.
inputs.name: Vertex Area Weigh Flag

inputs.description: Divide curvature value by the area of its vertex.
inputs.name: Vertex Area Normalize Flag

inputs.description: Weigh curvature by the fractional vertex area.
inputs.name: Vertex Area Weigh Fractional Flag

inputs.description: Normalize curvature by the fractional vertex area.
inputs.name: Vertex Area Normalize Fractional Flag

inputs.description: Scale the mean and areaNorm integrals by a factor.
inputs.name: Post Scale Factor

inputs.description: Write the calculated curvature values to files in FreeSurfer format.
inputs.name: Write Curvature Files Flag

inputs.description: Calculate shape index despite potential atan issues.
inputs.name: Shape Index Flag

inputs.description: Output file stem for results.
inputs.name: Output File Stem

inputs.description: Number of bins for curvature histogram.
inputs.name: Histogram Bins

inputs.description: Number of bins for percentage-based curvature histogram.
inputs.name: Percentage Histogram Bins

inputs.description: Size of each histogram bin.
inputs.name: Histogram Bin Size

inputs.description: Histogram bin start value.
inputs.name: Histogram Bin Start

inputs.description: Histogram bin end value.
inputs.name: Histogram Bin End

inputs.description: Label file to constrain statistics to a region.
inputs.name: Label File

inputs.description: Report integral percentages relative to the region.
inputs.name: Regional Percentages Flag

inputs.description: High pass filter for curvature values.
inputs.name: High Pass Filter

inputs.description: Low pass filter for curvature values.
inputs.name: Low Pass Filter

inputs.description: High pass filter for Gaussian curvature values.
inputs.name: High Pass Filter Gaussian

inputs.description: Low pass filter for Gaussian curvature values.
inputs.name: Low Pass Filter Gaussian

inputs.description: Store processed surface vertices in a label file.
inputs.name: Filter Label File

inputs.description: Output min/max information for the processed curvature.
inputs.name: Min/Max Info Flag

inputs.description: Normalize the curvature before computation.
inputs.name: Normalize Curvature Flag

inputs.description: Write out stats as a summary condition.
inputs.name: Summary Condition

inputs.description: Scale curvature values between min and max curvature.
inputs.name: Min Curvature Scale

inputs.description: End value for curvature scaling.
inputs.name: Max Curvature Scale

inputs.description: Scale curvature values with a factor.
inputs.name: Scale Factor

inputs.description: Print out version number.
inputs.name: Version Flag

inputs.description: Sets the curvature values at that index to zero.
inputs.name: Set Zero Vertex

inputs.description: Toggle a more rigorous floating point comparison operation.
inputs.name: Max Ulps
